blocks.name: df-oc
blocks.content: Define orthogonal complement of a subset (usually a subspace) of Hilbert space. The orthogonal complement is the set of all vectors orthogonal to all vectors in the subset. See ~ ocval and ~ chocvali for its value. Textbooks usually denote this unary operation with the symbol ` _|_ ` as a small superscript, although Mittelstaedt uses the symbol as a prefix operation. Here we define a function (prefix operation) ` _|_ ` rather than introducing a new syntactic form. This lets us take advantage of the theorems about functions that we already have proved under set theory. Definition of [Mittelstaedt] p. 9. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: df-ch0
blocks.content: Define the zero for closed subspaces of Hilbert space. See ~ h0elch for closure law. (Contributed by NM, 30-May-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: elch0
blocks.content: Membership in zero for closed subspaces of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 6-Apr-2001.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: h0elch
blocks.content: The zero subspace is a closed subspace. Part of Proposition 1 of [Kalmbach] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 30-May-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: h0elsh
blocks.content: The zero subspace is a subspace of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: hhssva
blocks.content: The vector addition operation on a subspace. (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm hhssva(class c0, class c1) {

  -| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c0))), cres(cno, c0)))
} = {
  3eqtrri(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cfv(cpv, c1), cfv(c1st, cfv(c1st, c1)), cfv(c1st, cop(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c0)))))
  vafval(cfv(cpv, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cpv, c1))
  fveq2i(c1st, cfv(c1st, c1), cop(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c0))))
  eqtri(cfv(c1st, c1), cop(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c0))), cfv(c1st, cop(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c0))), cres(cno, c0))))
  fveq2i(c1st, c1, cop(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c0))), cres(cno, c0)))
  op1st(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c0))), cres(cno, c0))
  opex(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c0)))
  resex(cno, c0)
  mp2an(wcel(cno, universe), wf(cno, chba, cr), wcel(chba, universe))
  normf()
  ax-hilex()
  fex(cno, chba, cr, universe)
  op1st(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c0)))
  ax-mp(wcel(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), universe), wcel(cva, cablo))
  hilablo()
  resexg(cva, cablo, cxp(c0, c0))
  resex(csm, cxp(cc, c0))
  hvmulex()

  mp2an(normh ‚àà ùïå, (normh : ~H ‚Üí ‚Ñù), ~H ‚àà ùïå)

thm issubgoilem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c4, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  vtocl2ga(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c4, c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(c0, c4, cv(s1))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c3, cv(s1))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c4, cv(s1))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c4, c2), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c3)
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c4)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(c0, c4, cv(s1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c3, cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c4, c2))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c3, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issubgoilem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c0[c3]c2)=(c0[c4]c2))
  ‚ä£ ((s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(s0[c3]s1)=(s0[c4]s1))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  vtocl2ga(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, (c0[c3]c2)=(c0[c4]c2), (s0[c3]s1)=(s0[c4]s1), (c0[c3]s1)=(c0[c4]s1))
  eqeq12d((s0[c3]s1), (s0[c4]s1), (c0[c3]s1), (c0[c4]s1), s0 = c0)
  oveq1(s0, c0, c3, s1)
  oveq1(s0, c0, c4, s1)
  eqeq12d((c0[c3]s1), (c0[c4]s1), (c0[c3]c2), (c0[c4]c2), s1 = c2)
  oveq2(s1, c2, c0, c3)
  oveq2(s1, c2, c0, c4)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c0[c3]s1), (c0[c4]s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c3, s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (c0[c3]c2), (c0[c4]c2))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c3, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c2)
}

  3adant1(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cv(hs1), cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cv(hs2))), co(cv(hs0), cva, co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs2)))))

blocks.content: Abelian group property of subspace addition. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Aug-2021.) (New usage is discouraged.)

thm hhssabloi(class c0) {
  |- wcel(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cablo)

} = {
  isabloi(hs0, hs1, cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0)
  simp2i(wcel(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cgr), wcel(cva, cgr), wss(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cva))
  hhssabloilem(c0)
  mpbi(wceq(cdm(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0))), cxp(c0, c0)), wss(cxp(c0, c0), cdm(cva)))
  sseqtr4i(cxp(c0, c0), cdm(cva), cxp(chba, chba))
  mp2an(wss(cxp(c0, c0), cxp(chba, chba)), wss(c0, chba), wss(c0, chba))
  shssii(c0)
  xpss12(c0, chba, c0, chba)
  fdmi(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  ssdmres(cxp(c0, c0), cva)
  3eqtr4d(co(cv(hs0), cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cv(hs1), chba))
  sheli(cv(hs0), c0)
  sheli(cv(hs1), c0)
  ax-hvcom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  ovres(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c0, cva)
  ancoms(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs1), cva, cv(hs0))))
  ovres(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0), c0, cva)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)

thm hhshsslem2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(c0, csh)
  -| wceq(c1, cop(cop(cva, csm), cno))
  -| wceq(c2, cop(cop(cres(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), cres(csm, cxp(cc, c0))), cres(cno, c0)))
  -| wcel(c2, cfv(css, c1))
  -| wss(c0, chba)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0)), wa(wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0))), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0)))))
  pm3.2i(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0))
  eqeltrri(c0v, c0, cfv(cn0v, c2))
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(cn0v, c2), c0v), wcel(c1, cnv), wcel(c2, cfv(css, c1)))
  sspz(c1, c2, cfv(css, c1), cfv(cn0v, c2), c0v)
  hh0v(c1)
  eleqtrri(cfv(cn0v, c2), c0, cfv(cba, c2))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(cn0v, c2), cfv(cba, c2)), wcel(c2, cnv))
  nvzcl(c2, cfv(cn0v, c2), cfv(cba, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cba, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cn0v, c2))
  pm3.2i(wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0))), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0))))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0))
  eqeltrrd(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cpv, c2), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  mpanl12(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cpv, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, cnv), wcel(c2, cfv(css, c1)))
  sspgval(c1, c2, cfv(css, c1), cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), cfv(cpv, c2), cva)
  hhva(c1)
  mp3an1(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cpv, c2), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(c2, cnv))
  nvgcl(c2, cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), cfv(cpv, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cpv, c2))
  rgen2(hs0, hs1, cc, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0))
  eqeltrrd(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cns, c2), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  mpanl12(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cns, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1))), wcel(c1, cnv), wcel(c2, cfv(css, c1)))
  sspsval(c1, c2, cfv(css, c1), cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cfv(cns, c2), csm)
  hhsm(c1)
  mp3an1(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cns, c2), cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(c2, cnv))
  mp2an(wcel(c2, cnv), wcel(c1, cnv), wcel(c2, cfv(css, c1)))
  hhnv(c1)
  sspnv(c1, c2, cfv(css, c1))
  eqid(cfv(css, c1))
  nvscl(c2, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cfv(cns, c2))
  hhshsslem1(c0, c2, c1)
  eqid(cfv(cns, c2))
  issh2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm hhshsslem2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚àà SH
  ‚ä£ c1 = < < +h, .h >, normh >
  ‚ä£ c2 = < <(+h |`(c0 √ó c0)),(.h |`(‚ÑÇ √ó c0))>,(normh |` c0)>
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà(SubSp ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚äÜ ~H
} = {
  mpbir2an(c0 ‚àà SH, (c0 ‚äÜ ~H ‚àß 0h ‚àà c0), (‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0[+h]hs1)‚àà c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0[.h]hs1)‚àà c0))))
  pm3.2i(c0 ‚äÜ ~H, 0h ‚àà c0)
  eqeltrri(c0v, c0, (0vec ` c2))
  mp2an((0vec ` c2)= 0h, c1 ‚àà NrmCVec, c2 ‚àà(SubSp ` c1))
  sspz(c1, c2, (SubSp ` c1), (0vec ` c2), c0v)
  hh0v(c1)
  eleqtrri((0vec ` c2), c0, (BaseSet ` c2))
  ax-mp((0vec ` c2)‚àà(BaseSet ` c2), c2 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  nvzcl(c2, (0vec ` c2), (BaseSet ` c2))
  eqid((BaseSet ` c2))
  eqid((0vec ` c2))
  pm3.2i(‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0[+h]hs1)‚àà c0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0,(hs0[.h]hs1)‚àà c0)))
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, c0, (hs0[+h]hs1)‚àà c0)
  eqeltrrd((hs0[+h]hs1), c0, (hs0[(+v ` c2)]hs1), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0))
  mpanl12((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0), (hs0[(+v ` c2)]hs1)=(hs0[+h]hs1), c1 ‚àà NrmCVec, c2 ‚àà(SubSp ` c1))
  sspgval(c1, c2, (SubSp ` c1), hs0, c0, hs1, (+v ` c2), cva)
  hhva(c1)
  mp3an1(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c0, (hs0[(+v ` c2)]hs1)‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  nvgcl(c2, hs0, c0, hs1, (+v ` c2))
  eqid((+v ` c2))
  rgen2(hs0, hs1, cc, c0, (hs0[.h]hs1)‚àà c0)
  eqeltrrd((hs0[.h]hs1), c0, (hs0[(.sOLD ` c2)]hs1), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0))
  mpanl12((hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà c0), (hs0[(.sOLD ` c2)]hs1)=(hs0[.h]hs1), c1 ‚àà NrmCVec, c2 ‚àà(SubSp ` c1))
  sspsval(c1, c2, (SubSp ` c1), hs0, hs1, c0, (.sOLD ` c2), csm)
  hhsm(c1)
  mp3an1(hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà c0, (hs0[(.sOLD ` c2)]hs1)‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà NrmCVec)
  mp2an(c2 ‚àà NrmCVec, c1 ‚àà NrmCVec, c2 ‚àà(SubSp ` c1))
  hhnv(c1)
  sspnv(c1, c2, (SubSp ` c1))
  eqid((SubSp ` c1))
  nvscl(c2, hs0, hs1, c0, (.sOLD ` c2))
  hhshsslem1(c0, c2, c1)
  eqid((.sOLD ` c2))
  issh2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm hhsssh2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wcel(c1, cnv), wss(c0, chba)))

  imp(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c0))), wa(wcel(c3, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  anim12d(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c0)), wcel(c3, chba), wcel(c2, chba))
  sseld(c3, c0, chba, wcel(c0, csh))
  shss(c0)
  sseld(c2, cfv(cort, c0), chba, wcel(c0, csh))
  shocss(c0)
  orthcom(c3, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shorth(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà SH ‚Üí(c1 ‚äÜ(_|_ ` c0)‚Üí((c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(c2[.ih]c3)= 0)))
} = {
  exp32(c0 ‚àà SH, c1 ‚äÜ(_|_ ` c0), (c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), (c2[.ih]c3)= 0)

  ancomd((c1 ‚äÜ(_|_ ` c0)‚àß(c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0)), c3 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0))
  imp(c1 ‚äÜ(_|_ ` c0), (c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c0), (c2 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0)‚àß c3 ‚àà c0))
  anim1d(c1 ‚äÜ(_|_ ` c0), c2 ‚àà c1, c3 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0))
  ssel(c1, (_|_ ` c0), c2)
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß(c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0))), (c2[.ih]c3)= 0, (c3[.ih]c2)= 0)
  imp(c0 ‚àà SH, (c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0)), (c3[.ih]c2)= 0)
  shocorth(c0, c3, c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß(c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0))), ((c3[.ih]c2)= 0 ‚Üî(c2[.ih]c3)= 0), (c3 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚àà ~H))
  imp(c0 ‚àà SH, (c3 ‚àà c0 ‚àß c2 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0)), (c3 ‚àà ~H ‚àß c2 ‚àà ~H))
  anim12d(c0 ‚àà SH, c3 ‚àà c0, c2 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0), c3 ‚àà ~H, c2 ‚àà ~H)
  sseld(c3, c0, chba, c0 ‚àà SH)
  shss(c0)
  sseld(c2, (_|_ ` c0), chba, c0 ‚àà SH)

blocks.name: ocin
blocks.content: Intersection of a Hilbert subspace and its complement. Part of Proposition 1 of [Kalmbach] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ocin(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, csh), wceq(cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), c0h))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), c0h, wcel(c0, csh))
  3bitr4g(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0h), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0v))
  impbid(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0v))
  impd(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0v))
  com23(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0v))
  syl6bi(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, c0)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0v)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wral(hs1, c0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1)), nat0))))
  shocel(hs1, c0, cv(hs0))
  sylan9r(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wral(hs1, c0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1)), nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0v), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  rspccv(hs1, c0, cv(hs0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1)), nat0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs1)), nat0, co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs0), csp)
  biimpd(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0v))
  his6(cv(hs0))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, csh), wceq(cv(hs0), c0v), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, c0))), wa(wcel(c0v, c0), wcel(c0v, cfv(cort, c0))))
  jca(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c0v, c0), wcel(c0v, cfv(cort, c0)))
  sh0(c0)
  oc0(c0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0v), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cort, c0)), wcel(c0v, c0), wcel(c0v, cfv(cort, c0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0v, c0)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0v, cfv(cort, c0))
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(cort, c0))
  elch0(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0h)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, csh))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0)), nat0))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà SH ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÇ(_|_ ` c0))= 0H)

  3bitr4g(c0 ‚àà SH, hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(_|_ ` c0)), hs0 ‚àà 0H, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0)), hs0 = 0h)

  shocel(hs1, c0, hs0)

  jca(c0 ‚àà SH, 0h ‚àà c0, 0h ‚àà(_|_ ` c0))

  eleq1(hs0, c0v, c0)
  eleq1(hs0, c0v, (_|_ ` c0))
  elin(hs0, c0, (_|_ ` c0))

blocks.name: occon3
blocks.content: Hilbert lattice contraposition law. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm occon3(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba)), wb(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0))))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba)), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0)))
  sylsyld(wa(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba)), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), wss(c1, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1))), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, c0)))
  adantl(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba), wss(c1, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1))))
  ococss(c1)
  sylan2(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba), wi(wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, c0))), wss(cfv(cort, c1), chba))
  ocss(c1)
  occon(c0, cfv(cort, c1))
  sstr2(c1, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c1)), cfv(cort, c0))
  sylsyld(wa(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba)), wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), wss(c0, cfv(cort, c1)), wss(c0, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0))), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)), cfv(cort, c1)))
  adantr(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba), wss(c0, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0))))
  ococss(c0)
  syl2anr(wss(c0, chba), wss(c1, chba), wi(wss(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), wss(cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)), cfv(cort, c1))), wss(c1, chba), wss(cfv(cort, c0), chba))
  id(wss(c1, chba))
  ocss(c0)
  occon(c1, cfv(cort, c0))
  sstr2(c0, cfv(cort, cfv(cort, c0)), cfv(cort, c1))
}

blocks.name: ocnel
blocks.content: A nonzero vector in the complement of a subspace does not belong to the subspace. (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ocnel(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), wne(c1, c0v)), wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), wne(c1, c0v), wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  necon3ad(c1, c0v, wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, cfv(cort, c0))), wcel(c1, c0))
  syl6ib(wa(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, cfv(cort, c0))), wcel(c1, c0), wceq(c1, c0v), wcel(c1, c0h))
  imp(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c1, c0h)))
  expcomd(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, cfv(cort, c0)), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c1, c0h))
  syl5bir(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c1, cfv(cort, c0))), wcel(c1, c0h), wcel(c1, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0))))
  elin(c1, c0, cfv(cort, c0))
  biimpd(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0))), wcel(c1, c0h))
  eleq2d(c1, cin(c0, cfv(cort, c0)), c0h, wcel(c0, csh))
  ocin(c0)
  elch0(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ocnel(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà SH ‚àß c1 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0)‚àß c1 ‚â† 0h)‚Üí ¬¨ c1 ‚àà c0)
} = {

  imp(c0 ‚àà SH, c1 ‚àà(_|_ ` c0), (c1 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà 0H))

  elin(c1, c0, (_|_ ` c0))

blocks.name: chocvali
blocks.content: Value of the orthogonal complement of a Hilbert lattice element. The orthogonal complement of ` A ` is the set of vectors that are orthogonal to all vectors in ` A ` . (Contributed by NM, 8-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: shuni
blocks.content: Two subspaces with trivial intersection have a unique decomposition of the elements of the subspace sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shuni(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, csh))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, csh))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c4, c5), c0h))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cva, c2), co(c1, cva, c3)))
} = {
  jca(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  mpbid(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, cmv, c1), c0v))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cmv, c1), c0v), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba))
  hvsubeq0(c0, c1)
  eqcomd(c2, c3, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(c3, c2), wceq(co(c3, cmv, c2), c0v))
  eqtr3d(co(c3, cmv, c2), c0v, co(c0, cmv, c1), w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmv, c1), c0v), wcel(co(c0, cmv, c1), c0h))
  eleqtrd(co(c0, cmv, c1), c0h, cin(c4, c5), w0)
  elind(co(c0, cmv, c1), c4, c5, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cmv, c1), c4), wcel(c4, csh), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c1, c4))
  shsubcl(c4, c0, c1)
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cmv, c1), c5, co(c3, cmv, c2), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmv, c1), co(c3, cmv, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cva, c2), co(c1, cva, c3)))
  syl22anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cva, c2), co(c1, cva, c3)), wceq(co(c0, cmv, c1), co(c3, cmv, c2))), wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c3, chba))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c4, csh), wcel(c0, c4))
  shel(c4, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c4, csh), wcel(c1, c4))
  shel(c4, c1)
  hvaddsub4(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c3, cmv, c2), c5), wcel(c5, csh), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  shsubcl(c5, c3, c2)
  elch0(co(c0, cmv, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c3, cmv, c2), c0v), wceq(c3, c2)), wcel(c3, chba), wcel(c2, chba))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c3, chba), wcel(c5, csh), wcel(c3, c5))
  shel(c5, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c2, chba), wcel(c5, csh), wcel(c2, c5))
  shel(c5, c2)
  hvsubeq0(c3, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shuni(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 = c1 ‚àß c2 = c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà SH)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà SH)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c4 ‚ãÇ c5)= 0H)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[+h]c2)=(c1[+h]c3))
} = {
  jca(w0, c0 = c1, c2 = c3)
  mpbid(w0, c0 = c1, (c0[-h]c1)= 0h)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0[-h]c1)= 0h ‚Üî c0 = c1), c0 ‚àà ~H, c1 ‚àà ~H)
  hvsubeq0(c0, c1)
  eqcomd(c2, c3, w0)
  mpbid(w0, c3 = c2, (c3[-h]c2)= 0h)
  eqtr3d((c3[-h]c2), c0v, (c0[-h]c1), w0)
  sylib(w0, (c0[-h]c1)= 0h, (c0[-h]c1)‚àà 0H)
  eleqtrd((c0[-h]c1), c0h, (c4 ‚ãÇ c5), w0)
  elind((c0[-h]c1), c4, c5, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[-h]c1)‚àà c4, c4 ‚àà SH, c0 ‚àà c4, c1 ‚àà c4)
  shsubcl(c4, c0, c1)
  eqeltrd((c0[-h]c1), c5, (c3[-h]c2), w0)
  mpbid(w0, (c0[-h]c1)=(c3[-h]c2), (c0[+h]c2)=(c1[+h]c3))
  syl22anc(w0, ((c0[+h]c2)=(c1[+h]c3)‚Üî(c0[-h]c1)=(c3[-h]c2)), c0 ‚àà ~H, c2 ‚àà ~H, c1 ‚àà ~H, c3 ‚àà ~H)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ‚àà ~H, c4 ‚àà SH, c0 ‚àà c4)
  shel(c4, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, c1 ‚àà ~H, c4 ‚àà SH, c1 ‚àà c4)
  shel(c4, c1)
  hvaddsub4(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  syl3anc(w0, (c3[-h]c2)‚àà c5, c5 ‚àà SH, c3 ‚àà c5, c2 ‚àà c5)
  shsubcl(c5, c3, c2)
  elch0((c0[-h]c1))
  syl2anc(w0, ((c3[-h]c2)= 0h ‚Üî c3 = c2), c3 ‚àà ~H, c2 ‚àà ~H)
  syl2anc(w0, c3 ‚àà ~H, c5 ‚àà SH, c3 ‚àà c5)
  shel(c5, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, c2 ‚àà ~H, c5 ‚àà SH, c2 ‚àà c5)
  shel(c5, c2)
  hvsubeq0(c3, c2)
}

blocks.name: chocunii
blocks.content: Lemma for uniqueness part of Projection Theorem. Theorem 3.7(i) of [Beran] p. 102 (uniqueness part). (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm chocunii(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, cfv(cort, c1)))), wi(wa(wceq(c5, co(c0, cva, c2)), wceq(c5, co(c3, cva, c4))), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c4))))
  -| wcel(c1, cch)
} = {

blocks.name: pjhthmo
blocks.content: Projection Theorem, uniqueness part. Any two disjoint subspaces yield a unique decomposition of vectors into each subspace. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
